doc.repnme: Transcript of joint meeting of the Executive Directors of the IBRD and IDA held on June 21, 1973
doc.abstracts: This is a joint meeting of the Executive Directors of International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and International Development Association (IDA), to the recommendation loan to Nigerian for an third education project. The post-war rehabilitation and economic recovery was virtually completed in Nigeria and that its balance of payments was strong thanks largely to the rapidly increasing oil revenues. The Government has recently decided to purchase, for cash, equity in the oil companies operating in Nigeria and there are proposals for investment in petroleum based industries, particularly in natural gas. The education project, which covers the secondary schools enrollment, is less than two percent-one of the lowest in the world-will provides about 30,000 additional places in secondary schools and bout 6,000 places in primary teachers training schools.
